Marketing Information: ViewSonic's new 22-inch eco-friendly monitors, the VA2251m-LED, are cost effective and produce a Full HD 1080p viewing experience. Featuring a widescreen superlative Full HD 1080p 1920 x 1080 resolution, the VA2251m-LED deliver immaculate images for work and home environments. An incorporated LED backlight as well as a power-saving ECO Mode produces higher levels of brightness and refine image details even in low light conditions. Reducing power consumption with three different brightness throughputs helps to save on energy and accommodate different environments. Built-in sRGB color correction technology and dynamic contrast ratios also manage pixel quality to the finest detail and produces a most comfortable viewing experience.
